name: crab-clean
short_description: A Rust-powered command-line tool that automates smart grouping and safe deletion to keep workspaces lean.
detailed_description: Built a high-performance system cleaning utility leveraging Rust's zero-cost abstractions for fast duplicate and unused file cleanup.
Designed a multi-threaded scanning architecture using Rayon, achieving 90% faster file hashing via optimized SHA-256 and parallel disk I/O.
Published and distributed via Crates.io with 926 active downloads.

name: solana-indexer
short_description: A lightweight, customizable SDK for indexing data from the Solana blockchain with automatic reorg handling.
detailed_description: Engineered a scalable data pipeline to efficiently index block, transaction, and account activity on Solana.
Built on tokio for asynchronous processing, allowing seamless backfilling and real-time updates via RPC polling, WebSockets, or Helius Webhooks.
Features a modular architecture with IDL-based type generation, providing a decoupled SDK for custom instruction decoding and type-safe event handling.

name: ShadowLend
short_description: A privacy-preserving lending protocol on Solana protecting user balances from predatory liquidation using Arcium TEEs.
detailed_description: Designed a hybrid privacy architecture protecting user deposit and borrow balances using client-side encryption and Ed25519 signatures.
Developed Solana smart contracts in Anchor for secure asset custody, validating off-chain Arcium execution attestations.
Implemented risk calculation logic (Interest, Health Factor) directly inside Arcium MXEs (Trusted Execution Environments) to secure borrowing positions.

name: CodeSync
short_description: Real-time collaborative coding environment with integrated whiteboard and AI chat.
detailed_description: Built real-time collaborative coding with whiteboard and AI chat using Gemini API
Optimized sync latency by 30% using Liveblocks and Convex reactive database
Implemented conflict-free resolution, reducing editing conflicts by 50%
Designed role-based permissions for room owners to manage user access

name: Hackverse
short_description: Scalable hackathon platform with secure RBAC and optimized database architecture.
detailed_description: Developed secure RBAC using Passport.js, NestJS guards, and decorators
Designed normalized PostgreSQL schema with Prisma ORM for efficient data storage
Built full-stack app with PostgreSQL, Next.js, and NestJS for scalability
Implemented Redux for consistent global state management

name: SolidKYC
short_description: Privacy-preserving on-chain KYC verification system using Solana and Zero-Knowledge Proofs.
detailed_description: Designed and implemented a decentralized KYC system where users prove identity validity without revealing personal data using Zero-Knowledge Proofs.
Built Solana smart contracts using Anchor to verify zk-SNARK proofs on-chain and manage verification state.
Integrated Circom and snarkjs to generate and verify cryptographic proofs for off-chain identity validation.
Implemented wallet-based authentication and transaction signing using Solana Wallet Adapter.
Developed a React-based frontend to handle proof generation, wallet interaction, and on-chain verification flow.
Ensured non-custodial identity ownership by allowing users to control credentials locally while only submitting proofs to the blockchain.

name: AMM Uniswap V2
short_description: From-scratch implementation of a Uniswap V2-style Automated Market Maker to understand DEX internals.
detailed_description: Implemented core Uniswap V2 AMM mechanics including constant product formula (x*y=k), liquidity pools, swaps, and LP token minting.
Built swap, add liquidity, and remove liquidity flows to understand pricing, slippage, and pool balance invariants.
